You know what makes me angry? People who refer to the "art of alchemy."

It's a science, people!

For example, rigorous, peer-reviewed research tells me inside the Golden Labyrinth one can find blood crystalsâ€”congealed pain from the labyrinths' many victims."Science says that?"

Yes! There's a whole method and everything!

Science involves sacrifice, too. Like those people who died in the Golden Labyrinth to make the blood crystals you're going to gather.

It's all quite scientific."What do blood crystals do?"

We don't know...yet! We need to do more science!

But the distilled essence of life-ending pain...that's got to be fascinating, right?

Now go get those blood crystals. Science says so!
Blood crystals...excellent. I can feel the pain from here.
You're not afraid of a little pain, are you?
